plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am short and cover the ground.

plant.question: I have a trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 I have leaves that change color.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many colors like red, yellow, and purple.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me!

plant.question: I have prickly stems and beautiful flowers. Be careful when you touch me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red and given as a gift.
🌵 I have thorns to protect myself.

plant.question: I am big and yellow and grow on a tall stalk. You can eat me as a vegetable. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I can be popped and eaten as a snack.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a big, strong tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels bury me in the ground.
🌳 I can grow into an Oak.

plant.question: I am red and round, and grow on a vine. I am a fruit that many people love in their salad or sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I'm often mistaken for a vegetable.
🍝 I'm used to make ketchup and spaghetti sauce.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree with needles instead of leaves. Many people decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
⭐ People put lights on me during the holidays.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a plant with yellow flowers. My seeds can be pressed to make oil. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I turn my head to follow the sun.
🐥 Birds love to eat my seeds.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I love to munch on leaves big and small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I might turn into a butterfly!

bug.question: I fly around flowers and make honey. What am I?
I light up the night sky with my glow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I come out when it's dark.

bug.question: I have pretty wings and fly from flower to flower. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I used to be a caterpillar.
🌈 My wings have lots of colors.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I live in a colony underground.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make music in the summer.

bug.question: I am small, red, and have black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 I am a sign of good fortune

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my dinner. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky and strong.

bug.question: I hide under rocks and curl into a ball when scared. What am I?
I sing very loudly in the summertime, but I live underground for most of my life. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 My song is very distinct and loud!
🌳 You hear me in the trees on a hot summer day!
